description: Try our easy to follow Lettuce Cups With Creamy Crab recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lettuce wrap,Pescatarian,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Seafood,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lettuce Cups With Creamy Crab Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup lemon juice (and 1 tsp finely grated lemon rind)

recipeInstructions.text: Place yolk, lemon juice, rind, half of the dill and mustard in a small food processor. Process until creamy.
With the motor running, gradually add the oil in a steady stream and process until mixture is thick and pale. Stir in crab meat and cornichons. Season to taste.
Separate lettuce leaves. Trim ends. Fill each leaf with the crab mixture, season with cracked pepper and garnish with extra dill and lemon slices. Serve.
